author: dcasota
body:
On ../docs/building/internals.md it is described how to build Powershell on Ubuntu.
“Lastly, run nuget pack . from within the folder. Note that you may need the latest nuget.exe.”  What does this mean exactly? nuget.exe is Windows x86 cmdline-only.

comments.author: dcasota
comments.body: Unfortunately I am not skilled enough to drill down to the root cause and to get a solution bakened, but in my issue the use of nuget.exe has become obsolet.

title: build description on Ubuntu using nuget.exe in docs/building/internals.md
